pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Cho Kamen Rider Den-O & Decade Neo Generations: The Onigashima Warship (2009, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Diend's $(l:decade/items/k_touch_diend)Final Kamen Terminal K-Touch (Diend)$(/l)$(br2)Can be used to summon $(l:kabuto/riders/caucasus)Kamen Rider Caucasus$(/l) when right-clicked as $(l:decade/riders/diend)Kamen Rider Diend$(/l)
